## install conda
```{bash}
#| echo: false
#| eval: false
## download miniconda
wget https://repo.anaconda.com/miniconda/Miniconda3-latest-MacOSX-arm64.sh
## or from https://www.anaconda.com/docs/getting-started/miniconda/main

## install miniconda
bash Miniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh

```

## create conda environment
```{bash}
#| echo: false
#| eval: false
conda create -n gene46100 python=3.12
conda activate gene46100

```

## install packages 
(issues with torch version incompatibility with torchvision and torchmetrics)
```{bash}
#| echo: false
#| eval: false

# conda install scikit-learn plotnine pytorch 

## installing torchvision and torchmetrics forces downgrading torch to 2.3.1 which is not compatible with mps

```

## install all packages within jupyter notebook with %pip
```
#| echo: false
#| eval: false
%pip install scikit-learn plotnine tqdm pandas 
%pip install torch
%pip install torchvision
%pip install torchmetrics
```
